channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Waste water causing slippery surface, ice when below 0, 23rd November
item.description:
Water continues to run off of this property on to Mackenzie Road causing obstruction to the pavement and a slip hazard. This has previously been reported at least three times: Report reference: 7408705 and 7445556 and 5901776 You have previously deferred to Thames Water who clearly haven't been able to fix the issue or take action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mackenzie Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins blocking parking, 23rd November
item.description:
Number 2 Pincott Road, DA6 are placing their bins in the parking bay to stop other cars parking on the road. It is permit holders only 0830 -1730 but not on Sundays so other members of the public should be able to use it. They have been doing this for the last few months but this is the first time I am reporting it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pincott Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
